pages.text: $(Item)Cells$() are items that can hold exotic materials, like antimatter. $(bold)Be careful with them, they have a tendency to explode and release deadly gamma ray bursts.$()

Filling and emptying cells is done by putting the filled or empty cell in the input slot of the $(l:containment_chambers/neutral_containment)neutral containment's$() controller. $(bold)Cells must be charged to hold the material.$() They can be charged using most mods charging methods like Thermal Expansion's Energetic Infuser, or Mekanism's Energy Cube.

$(bold)When the cells are filled with material, they will drain power constantly. If they run out of power they will catastrophically fail.$() Be sure to use them or empty them back into the neutral containment chamber before this happens.
